description:
Saiga falls unconscious into Ginza’s hands after telling her where Kagura is hiding. The rogue cop will stop at nothing to claim Saiga as her own  - even if it means turning Kagura over to the enemy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mutter liegt im Sterben, komm sofort zurück
Ta mère est mourante, reviens immédiatement
Tua madre è in agonia, torna subito a casa
ハハキトク スグカエレ
